alert.note: Alert for Dawson; McCone; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McCone, north central Prairie and southwestern Dawson Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Circle, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Circle, Lindsay, Bloomfield and Hoyt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
